## RefractNode class

Calculates the refraction direction

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class RefractNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns the refraction of incident vector I through surface with normal N using the ratio of indices of refraction eta. The first two inputs must be the same vector type (vec2 or vec3). The third input (eta) is always a float scalar. Used for transparent materials and refractive effects.
